name: Attack the Hive
description:
Welcome!

Hello there! I'm Nice Cream and this is Attack the Hive! (For PC.) It's a metroidvania I'm working on for, well, some time now. I hope you enjoy the game, and if you do, you can message me on discord (Nice Cream#4839) to know more about the game!

What's the Game?

In this game, you're a wasp trying to destroy a bee hive, the reason? Wasps and bees got into a war, and the bees won, so with very few wasps left, and with no reputation, you set yourself on a crazy quest of destroying the hive all by yourself, will it work? We'll see.

Default Controls: (You can change all of them besides shooting in options) Credits: Most of the stuff:

Coding, art, characters, story, etc. were made by: Nice Cream

Music:

The Hive music was made by: Brahimi Medhi

Voices:

Billy was voiced by: Benjamin Monkelbaan

Executioner Bee was voiced by: Lily Sylvie

Generic Bee Worker Voice was made by: Nice Cream
